website_summaries.verdict: This curved squeegee is recognized for its durable steel design and high ratings.
pros: Curved design works well in hard-to-reach corners and spills
cons: Rubber is stiffer than some owners appreciate

customer_reviews.title: piss poor rubber
customer_reviews.text: I have squeegees over 10 years old and still going strong. This 1 yr. old pc. of crap now has the rubber torn 2" from the end right where it connects to the metal frame. Why is it so hard to find quality products. Do people really want Trunp out of office? This squeegee is so weak you could not even use it to push the Democrats off the floor. Amazon needs to be the leader and sell better products. Stop offering crap. Think about America once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Innovative Cabinetry

customer_reviews.title: Great Squeegie!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great squeegee!! I used this to prep to garage floors for painting (during the cleaning process). I loved the curved ends-allowed me to better control the clean-up (and I did several for each floor). Seems to be made well, good materials, should last quite a while. It is a little heavy, but it is INDUSTRIAL, so what would you expect??!!! I like a nice, solidly built item and this one fits the bill. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: flat surface only
customer_reviews.text: The rubber is very stiff meaning if your surface is not perfectly flat it does not work very well. The concrete in my basement has a couple of millimeter variance and that throws this thing off. I would recommend for nice flat surface, otherwise avoid.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I think this is great for an industrial application but too heavy duty for the average homeowner. I recently epoxied my garage floor so when I wash it down I would like to squeegee dry my floor. The blade is 3/16" hard rubber that is very stiff. I am sure it probably would limber up after a lot of use that an industrial application would apply but for the home owner probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L

customer_reviews.title: Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty product, it takes a little getting used to but once you do it gets the job done. My garage has standing water after every rain, I’d use a shop broom to sweep the water out, this squeegee works much better than the broom. Don’t forget to buy a handle as you just get the squeegee for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo9918

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty squeegee!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great heavy duty squeegee... I use this to remove snow, water, sand, and gravel from my garage floor. Even with major use, I can see it lasting a long time!
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a large flat slightly imperfect concrete surface. Just flexible enough to get a good seal.
customer_reviews.author: Jess H.

customer_reviews.title: good quality but stiff blade...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this product because i get water in my shop after a heavy rain. i especially like the heavy duty presentation, solid workmanship and curved blade. however, the blade is quite stiff and does not wed with the floor in such a way that water is moved in a single pass. perhaps it will eventually 'give' and this problem will evaporate (forgive the pun).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality, heavy duty squeegee.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built well. Very solid and heavy duty squeegee. For the price you cant go wrong with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for all uses.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is VERY stiff and does not conform to the surface as well as I would have hoped. It moves material around and the curved ends help that, however, it does not provide a tight fit and leaves material behind.
customer_reviews.author: J Prince

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in October 2017. It broke in December 2017. Less than 2 months. The rubber on the sides snaps off leaving only the middle part left. I tried contacting the seller but did not receive a respond. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Bought it to push snow out of the garage
customer_reviews.text: Got this to push snow and water out of the garage, so far it works well getting water out.
customer_reviews.author: Judson

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed for pet hair removal on carpeting.
customer_reviews.text: A great hard squeegee. I'm using it to pull up dog hair from my carpet that the vacuum doesn't get while my dogs are shedding like crazy. Just aware that you can't turn and screw in a handle. One has to be nailed in place.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this squeegee! The curved ends trap a lot of the water and prevent it from flowing back onto the space you're clearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny T

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy yet flexible - use for cleaning carport and driveway after heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: Greenmover

customer_reviews.title: Great push squeegee for floors
customer_reviews.text: This curved head squeegee does exactly what I wanted it for, removing water that comes under the garage door when it rains hard. I even used it to dry the sidewalk just to see how it would do, and the sidewalk dried much faster than it would have if left to evaporate on it's own. Works great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Talltexan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, heavy duty, works great on my garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing costumer service!
customer_reviews.text: The product didn’t work really well for me, but the costumer service was AMAZING, that’s why I’m giving 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Diogo Trevisan

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. We are talking professional quality here. Way more product than I needed but happy to get it. You cannot go wrong with this squeegee.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Karger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy to push around, but does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: CARANA

customer_reviews.title: Solid build
customer_reviews.text: Squeegee is sturdy and well built but could be made a little better. The rubber doesn't quite bend in line with metal but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, use it to push water out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, use it to push water out of the carport, Heavy duty, well made, works better than I thought it could.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price and quality is okay. Does not come with handle, so plan accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product was used while staining concrete in my living room. It worked very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality I recommend for super wet applications
customer_reviews.text: Great quality I recommend for super wet applications. It does not suit my application at all but that's not the products fault I'm the dummy that bought a commercial squeegee for a small patio
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go with a more expensive version
customer_reviews.text: The rubber blade is way to stiff does not make good contact with the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Udstuen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: mostly good, slightly uneven so it doesn't grab all the water.
customer_reviews.author: RichFromIndy

customer_reviews.title: This product was a disappointment. I purchased it with the impression that it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was a disappointment. I purchased it with the impression that it was an 'industrial grade' product which it is not. It has very week rubber and wears out quickly. I wouldn't suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lazenby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Almost useless, does not push the water well, one of the worse. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, beefy design with a thick rubber blade. This squeegee should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: breeblebox

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! My husband just used this. Not flexible at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squeegetastic
customer_reviews.text: Great squeegee, nice quality and pefect for pushing water out of the garage. Will be using this a lot throughout the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Drew R/T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and worked for my needs. I used it to remove water after cleaning the garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for squeegeeing the water off my fiberglass deck, very sturdy, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Julie E.

customer_reviews.title: Does what you think it should
customer_reviews.text: Great for garage cleaning - mounts on a standard wood handle.
customer_reviews.author: Travelguy

customer_reviews.title: Should do the job nicely. I assumed we could use a standard threaded ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the blade is a thick rubber. Should do the job nicely. I assumed we could use a standard threaded screw handle... I was wrong. Would be nice if it there was the description: "Requires a standard, barebone handle. Not threaded tip compatible."
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Walcott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sure helps clear out the melted snow and mud in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: MrH2oman

customer_reviews.title: Sealing the drive is never fun but this makes it easier!
customer_reviews.text: Works, I turn mine around so I don't have to walk in the finished product and the last one lasted over 10 years. The 3 foot one is too big for my lumpy pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping[ng. I am very pleased with this ,well made sturdy Squeegee
customer_reviews.author: NORMAN D.

customer_reviews.title: Water clean up
customer_reviews.text: It works for when the basement sub pump quits. It is good for water clean up and does the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Junk4dummies

customer_reviews.title: Tired of standing water? This is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Makes clearing out the water much easier. Bought steel head and pole so it should last.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and good design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. I had a 1 inch dowel about 4 feet long I used for a handle. I have used this a lot because of all the rain we've had lately. I have a spot on the driveway that water accumulates and this gets the job done quickly. Very sturdy - one I bought at the big box store failed second time I used it. This one will last.
customer_reviews.author: Ivyleaf

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - Does poor job in moving water
customer_reviews.text: The floor squeegee is not symmetrical. One end is bent at a different angled curve. It will still do the job, but quality control is lacking. You can buy the squeegee and 60" handle for about $21 at Menard's, & if they have their 11% rebate, even less. Handle alone is $4.99 plus tax. UPDATE: i HAVE NOW USED THE SQUEEGEE SEVERAL TIME AND IT PERFORMS POORLY. THE BLADE IS TOO STIFF TO ACTUALLY SQUEEGEE THE WATER EFFECTIVELY. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Pete M

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning water out of the garage after a storm
customer_reviews.text: Solid floor squeegee. Got it for moving water out of my garage after parking my post-storm vehicle in it. Moisture builds up quickly here in the southeast and if water stays too long inside, it'll cause mildew. So, the day following a rain shower, etc., I use this to force the water out. Anything remaining is made thin enough that it dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: FotomanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Well built and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: However, I had to return it. The rubber blade was so hard that it would not conform to the floor. In addition, because the rubber was so hard, and the design of the holder, the center part of the blade never touched the floor.
customer_reviews.author: TheOldCoot

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself a strong woman as a farm girl. I had to use all of my strength to push this down to clear off water. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: misti rose

customer_reviews.title: Chinese Wonder....
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few of these over the years and this particular floor squeegee is the best I have had the pleasure of owning. It works really well...in fact so well that I replaced all my floor squeegees with this particular model. Highly recommended, even though it is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be without one now
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Heavy duty. Weird winter this year so have already received a lot of views.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Fox

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to help prep garage floor for epoxy paint. Worked well to guide the water out during wash, etch & rinse
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: would of been better off buying a smaller one 12" wide and a ...
customer_reviews.text: The rubber is way too stiff to push the water on my deck, would of been better off buying a smaller one 12" wide and a thinner rubber squeegee.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: But I Would Buy Next Time The Straight Edge Broom With Squeegee In One Piece From home Depot It Has A Better Water Guiding Ability Than This
customer_reviews.text: Strong. But I Would Buy Next Time The Straight Edge Broom With Squeegee In One Piece From home Depot It Has A Better Water Guiding Ability Than This One
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Woks perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is designed to do! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This works very nicely and I like the curved edge better than my old straight squeegee. It is heavy duty. I used it in a low spot on our driveway where water pools and pushed it out and away very nicely and it worked well on the deck too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Works well on concrete in the garage when cleaning up ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well on concrete in the garage when cleaning up water also, snow and ice that comes from the tire wells of my truck during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Removes water from my courtyard area with an ease. No skipping and the curved ends contains the water.
customer_reviews.author: Mini Lady

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very well made for the price. If you have uneven surfaces all you need to do is cut slots in it with razorblade.
customer_reviews.author: scottr

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: nice product, does exactly what I wanted- I had my husband put a short handle on it for me and now it is easy to move the water off the patio
customer_reviews.author: Florence Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It pushes snow and slush out the door as it should. Leaves a dry patch behind it if you push hard. I cannot compare these as this is my only one. Very satisfied with my purchase through Amazon. Keeps my garage floor clean after a melting car leaves.
customer_reviews.author: BML

customer_reviews.title: seems to be very good quality. However we have finished garage floor with ...
customer_reviews.text: seems to be very good quality. However we have finished garage floor with textured surface. This item skims right over the water without moving most of it. The rubber is too rigid. I'm sure it would work great on very smooth surface, just not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Spitz

customer_reviews.title: Does not glide on floor as needed
customer_reviews.text: This tool did not work at all on my garage floor. Now I am stuck with an item that I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Patzkowsky

customer_reviews.title: This makes this item useless for sweeping water
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and the rubber is uneven. This makes this item useless for sweeping water. Also has a non standard attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Works! Replaced a broken head. This does seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Works! Replaced a broken head. This does seem more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: rdub

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very thick rubber, makes cool sound of tires peaking out when used on wet concrete. Wasn't hard to adjust angle using vice.
customer_reviews.author: It's Chuck Norse

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: We use this for pushing snow off a deck. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bowler

customer_reviews.title: Love the curves
customer_reviews.text: The curves are great for helping guide the water forward. The one bummer is that it isn't the best option for squeegeeing towards you because the curves end up the opposite way.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy and Amanda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Rubber split five weeks after use. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pullano

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely heavy duty. It meets all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Delbert

customer_reviews.title: worked great.
customer_reviews.text: we use this for our garage floor when it used to leak, worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S.

customer_reviews.title: Squeege moves the water
customer_reviews.text: Product is built very well and I expect it will last a long time. The curved ends definitely help push more water with each stroke. Was a good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I think you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: working very well, very strong and firm. I think you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gi L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver on pool of water on my driveway
customer_reviews.author: Harland V Caipang

customer_reviews.title: Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: My deck retains water after heavy rain and this product made it easy to move. The design allows a push to force the water forward and what took ten minutes now takes five. Good construction and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product, long wait.
customer_reviews.text: Had to wait a while to get it but it was worth the price and the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Mark North

customer_reviews.title: No handle
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize that this didn't come with the handle part. It does the job of pushing the snow and slush out of my garage.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy and works well but I did not realize it did not come with a handle so I had to go buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

product_meta.title: Ettore 24-Inch Curved Industrial Duty Steel Floor Squeegee, Silver, 24 In (54524)
product_meta.description: Size:24 InEttore’s 24-inch Curved Industrial Duty Steel Floor Squeegee is excellent for moving water and clean-up on grounds and floors. Perfect for decks, garages, driveways, sidewalks, industrial sites and beyond.
feature_bullets: 24-inch Curved Industrial Duty Steel Floor Squeegee; wood pole sold separately
Galvanized steel construction resists corrosion; replaceable chemical-resistant neoprene blade
Perfect for decks, garage, driveways, construction sites, plants, factories, agricultural
Moves large quantities of water and other fluids; stands up to most chemicals, paints, and solvents

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars290 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
